title: New: Kwabs – Something Right
body:
Yet another SOHN produced beauty from one of the voices of the year.

**Kwabs**. has been tearing up the UK airwaves as of late, and his newest track, _Something Right_, which saw it’s debut last night, is sure to do the same. His boldest yet, it’s powerful, overly dramatic and destined to cast a chilling silence amongst packed out venues across the country.
